common.congrats: Congratulations! You have reached level 100 and beaten the game.

supply_chain_ui.title: Supply Chain
supply_chain_ui.warning_prefix: Rubber production is lower than demand!
supply_chain_ui.auto_buyer_active_desc: Buys {amount} rubber when rubber drops below threshold.

optimize_production.name: Optimize Production
optimize_production.desc: Increases the efficiency of all machines, so less rubber is needed to produce the same amount of rubberbands.

online_marketing.name: Online Marketing
online_marketing.desc: Increases the effectivity of marketing significantly.

hyperpersonalisation.name: Hyperpersonalisation
hyperpersonalisation.desc: Increases the effectivity of marketing significantly.

rubber_recycling.name: Rubber Recycling
rubber_recycling.desc: Increases the output of rubber plantations and synthetic rubber factories by factor 2.

robotics.name: Robotics
robotics.desc: Makes machines more efficient and allows for the production of more machines.

brainwashing.name: Brainwashing
brainwashing.desc: Uses brainwashing to compel customers to buy rubberbands.

basic_manufacturing.name: Basic Manufacturing
basic_manufacturing.desc: Unlocks the ability to purchase machines.

sales_management.name: Sales Management
sales_management.desc: Unlocks the ability to hire an auto-buyer.

hypnosis.name: Hypnosis
hypnosis.desc: Uses mass hypnosis to compel customers to buy rubberbands.

mind_control.name: Mind Control
mind_control.desc: Uses mind control to compel customers to buy rubberbands.

molecular_transformation.name: Molecular Transformation
molecular_transformation.desc: Allows creating synthetic rubber from any earth matter, bypassing oil limits.

nanotechnology.name: Nanotechnology
nanotechnology.desc: Unlocks the ability to create self-replicating nanobots for manufacturing.

quantum_mechanics.name: Quantum Mechanics
quantum_mechanics.desc: Understanding the quantum realm allows for probabilistic manufacturing.

singularity_theory.name: Singularity Theory
singularity_theory.desc: Harnessing the power of a black hole for material extrusion. Eliminates all storage limits and costs.

interplanetary_logistics.name: Interplanetary Logistics
interplanetary_logistics.desc: Nano swarms will be able to travel to other planets to gather resources. Reduces storage costs by 99.99%.

time_travel.name: Time Travel
time_travel.desc: Why make it now when you can have already made it?
